product_name: Gerber Fast Draw Mini Combination Edge Knife
long_description: Gerber(R) Fast Draw uses a patented, forward-action spring technology (F.A.S.T.) to deploy blade quickly and confidently. Partially serrated blade is constructed of surgical 440 stainless steel for years of long-lasting use. Cross-bolt safety lock keeps blade securely in place. Hard, textured nylon handle ensures a firm grip. Stainless-steel pocket clip makes knife easy to carry and easy to access.
short_description: Gerber(R) Fast Draw uses a patented, forward-action spring technology (F.A.S.T.) to deploy blade quickly and confidently.
